story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_0100_:
Hahaha! Fear Team Flare! Run and create
more chaos!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_0200_: Oh no... Here they are again!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_0300_: First, let’s focus on evacuating everyone in town!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_0400_: OK! Trevs and I can lead everyone to a safer spot!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_0600_: We’ll stay here and stop Team Flare!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_0700_: Serena! Calem! I’ll battle with you!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_0900_:
Thanks! I’m counting on you, Shauna!
You too, Emma!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_1000_: Let’s team up and work our way through this!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_1200_:
You’ve been causing quite the ruckus. Not just at
my play but in town, too?
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_1300_: Stop dragging innocent people into your schemes!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_1400_:
I didn’t expect Champion Diantha to step in and
stop us...
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_1500_: Shoot! There’s no way we can take them on now.
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_1600_: Diantha! You came to help us!
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_1700_: Of course. I said it on stage as well, remember?
story_teamflare_01_07000/2401_1001_1800_: I will fight till the end with Diancie...for peace!
